item.title: "Hello world" in Keras (or, Scikit-learn versus Keras)
item.description: >>> %matplotlib inline >>> import seaborn as sns >>> import numpy as np >>> from sklearn.cross_validation import train_test_split >>> from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegressionCV >>> from keras.models import Sequential >>> from keras.layers.core import Dense, Activation >>> from keras.utils import np_utils >>> iris = sns.load_dataset("iris") >>> iris.head() >>> sns.pairplot(iris, hue='species') >>> X = iris.values[:, 0:4] >>> y = iris.values[:, 4] >>> train_X, test_X, train_y, test_y = train_test_split(X, y, train_size=0.5, random_state=0) >>> lr = LogisticRegressionCV() >>> lr.
